name: Star Rage VR
description: Star Rage VR is a FPS game that fights alien in outer space,it included a thrilling story with a great plot, exploring and many other diverse form of gameplay. You and your friends have to fight numerous aliens and reclaim the skies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Storage: 8 GB available space
